alert.note: Alert for Christian (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 14 at 7:44PM CDT until May 14 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CHRISTIAN COUNTY... At 744 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Morrisonville, or 8 miles northwest of Nokomis, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 7:37 PM, the public reported quarter size hail five miles southwest of Morrisonville. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Morrisonville and Palmer. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
